actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Two Keratin Blade or Bone Shard attacks. If both attacks hit one target the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) piercing damage as bits of bone dig deeper into the target.

actions.name: Keratin Blade
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 11 (2d6+4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Bone Shard
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit 30/120' one target 7 (2d4+2) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Malleable Physiology
special_abilities.desc: At the start of its turn the atavist gains one of the following benefits until it ends the effect (no action required) or the start of its next turn:Darkvision out to a range of 30 feet.A climbing flying or swimming speed of 30 feet.Advantage on Wis (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.Bony spikes sprout along its skin and a creature that touches the atavist or hits it with melee attack while within 5 ft. of it takes 4 (1d8) piercing damage.
